headline: LTX, a Broadridge Company, Expands Generative AI Capabilities with BondGPT Intelligence
summary: LTX, an AI-powered corporate bond trading platform backed by global Fintech leader Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. (NYSE:BR), today announced the launch of BondGPT Intelligence, a new capability that integrates powerful generative AI capabilities directly within trading platform workflows. The new functionality intelligently anticipates users' queries based on where they are in the investing and trading workflow, instantly delivering critical answers and empowering users to make informed dec

headline: 2 Reasons to Watch BR and 1 to Stay Cautious
summary: Since December 2024, Broadridge has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 3.3% while floating around $243.71.
